TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerator

summary.span: 支持对非泛型集合的简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a non-generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是所有非泛型枚举器的基接口。 is the base interface for all non-generic enumerators. 有关此接口的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this interface see . C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建议而不是直接操作枚举器。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 方法提供的 COM 互操作性，并且无需将其完全实现; 相反，实施者可能会引发。The method is provided for COM interoperability and does not need to be fully implemented; instead, the implementer can throw a . 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素; 否则为是不确定的。You must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of ; otherwise, is undefined. 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要设置再次集合的第一个元素，可以调用，如果实现它后后, 跟。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call , if it’s implemented, followed by . 如果是未实现，必须创建新的枚举数实例以返回到集合的第一个元素。If is not implemented, you must create a new enumerator instance to return to the first element of the collection. 如果更改到集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素，枚举器的行为未定义。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现和为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the and interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，没有显式调用这些接口的成员，但它们实现以支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 以循环访问集合。In this example, members of these interfaces are not explicitly called, but they are implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Current { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: Gets the element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未定义任何以下情况下： is undefined under any of the following conditions: - 创建枚举器后立即，枚举器定位在集合中的第一个元素之前。The enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection, immediately after the enumerator is created. 必须调用以枚举器前进到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . - 上次调用返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. - 枚举器无效，由于在集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素所做的更改。The enumerator is invalidated due to changes made in the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements. 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但它实现以支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大示例的接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数推进到集合的下一个元素。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: 如果枚举数已成功地推进到下一个元素，则为 ；如果枚举数传递到集合的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个枚举器或方法调用时，枚举器位于集合中，并在首次调用的第一个元素的前面方法移到第一个元素的集合的枚举器。After an enumerator is created or after the method is called, an enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to the method moves the enumerator over the first element of the collection. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用也会返回`false`直到调用。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false` until is called. 如果对集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素的行为更改是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但它实现以支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大示例的接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个元素之前。

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素的行为更改是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of is undefined. 方法提供的 COM 互操作性。The method is provided for COM interoperability. 它不一定需要实现;相反，实施者只需抛出。It does not necessarily need to be implemented; instead, the implementer can simply throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但它实现以支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大示例的接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#2)]

span.para: 对所有调用必须生成相同的状态的枚举器。首选的实现是集合的将枚举数移到第一个元素之前的元素的开头。这使枚举器，如果集合已被修改，枚举器自创建以来，这是与一致和。

All calls to must result in the same state for the enumerator. The preferred implementation is to move the enumerator to the beginning of the collection, before the first element. This invalidates the enumerator if the collection has been modified since the enumerator was created, which is consistent with and .
